divs: Sighting DetailsI was asleep on my couch and woke up. I looked out the window in my dining roomand saw a bright light in the distance. At first I thought it was a star butthen it appeared to be moving from side to side slightly and it was growingbigger. I then noticed some lights flashing to the sides of the brighter, whitelight. I figured it was just an airplane but the pattern was strange so got upfrom the couch and went to the door leading to our deck. I noticed the objectgetting much closer and it appeared to be very low to the ground. I turned offthe back porch light and stepped out onto the deck just in time to see it passover, I noticed what seemed to be an outline of a triangular shaped plane oraircraft but the entire bottom of the plane was lit up. I also noticed that forbeing so low, it made almost no sound, just a very faint rumbling sound. I ranback inside and out the front door. I had to step out onto our sidewalk to seethe aircraft as it went on by and noticed the lights on the back weresequentially flashing and different colors. I then went back inside.I pretty much figure it was just some kind of military plane but thought Id atleast let someone know.Thanks so much.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lawson
There were no other sightings in Lawson on or around July 1st 2003
